summary: Mellon-Vana is back, with a better look. Experience Fanatsy like never before.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#93c47d][size=3]Mellon-Vana is back and better than before. I recreated the ENB to have a very fantasy type look.
Well, the way I see fantasy - which is like, Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit.
The ENB will give beautiful weathers and an amazing time playing with it.
Enjoy
[/size][/color]
Performance wise, I get around 40-55 most of the time, but in grass heavy areas it can drop to as low as 30.
It's pretty good when playing normally. I have started to make a gameplay series of skyrim ALL 60FPS, using this ENB.

Specs:

GTX770 2GB
i7 2600k @ 3.4Ghz
9GB RAM @ 1600Mhz
[color=#8e7cc3]
More images will be posted all the time, and feel free to post your own. If you like the ENB then please endorse and if you have any problems lemme know in the 'Posts' section.[/color]

[color=#c27ba0][size=5][b][i]If you don't like the Cinematic Bars, to disable them in-game you press shift+enter and go to the enbeffect.txt section and disable Letterbox Bars.
To turn ENB off ingame press shift+\


[/i][/b][/size][/color]Thank you Hodilton for this amazing video!                                       Video Courtesy of BlueCheese85
[youtube]AWvuxK4jia8[/youtube][youtube]tLO1KRcAWGQ[/youtube]

Video by Me :P
[youtube]GWN9BKMgGJg[/youtube]

Video by iMineskyHIGH xx
[youtube]x_KHzk1T2pQ[/youtube]
[color=#a64d79][size=6]CoT, ELFX, and ELE will work, but tyhe lighting will be WAY TOO RED!! USE RELIGHTING SKYRIM!![/size][/color]

[color=#dd7e6b][size=4][b]*******************************************************************************************************************[/b][/size][/color]
[color=#dd7e6b][b][u][size=5]Install/Uninstall

TO INSTALL[/size][/u][/b]

1. Download[url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0265.htm] ENB Series v0.264 or above[/url], (the download button is on the bottom).

2. Extract [b]ONLY the [size=4]d3d9.dll[/size] and the [size=4]enbhost.exe[/size] [/b]from the [b]wrapper version [/b]to your Skyrim directory, (by default at C:Program Files (x86)/Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim).

3. Place enb Files into the Skyrim directory

4.Add optional files to skyrim directory if you want.

5. Add (or modify) these lines to your [b]SkyrimPrefs.ini[/b] file (located by default in C:/Users/xxxxxxx/Documents/My Games/Skyrim)
iMultiSample=0
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1

6. Set your enblocal.ini file for these two lines- [url=http://wiki.step-project.com/Guide:ENB#tab=Installation]For a tutorial Go here[/url]:
ReservedMemorySizeMb=xxx
VideoMemorySizeMb=xxxx

7. Open your Skyrim Launcher (NOT SKSE) and diasable ALL Anti-Aliasing and Anisotropic Filtering


[b][u][size=5]TO UNINSTALL[/size][/u][/b]
Delete all files you added from the enb
[b][size=4]*********************************************************************************************************************

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60136/?]Original Mellon-Vana ENB[/url]


[/size][/b][/color]
